wikipedia_page.main: Charles Gordon Mosley FRSA (14 September 1948 – 5 November 2013) was a British genealogist who was among the foremost experts on British nobility. He was an author, broadcaster, editor, and publisher, best known for having been Editor-in-Chief of Burke's Peerage & Baronetage (106th edition)—its first update since 1970—and of the re-titled 107th edition, Burke's Peerage, Baronetage & Knightage (2003).

response: *  2013   – Charles Mosley, English genealogist and author (b. 1948)
** and Charles Mosley, Burke's Peerage, Baronetage & Knightage. 107th edition, 2003.
